transcript: So, tonight, are you going to not pee during my one break when I come backstage? >> I always have to pee so bad by then. It's been really hot. I've been drinking a lot of water side stage. >> It's like the only time you're not on stage is the one time >> I see you when you come off long enough to be like, I could You don't realize that's my short break and then I have a longer break immediately after that where you are every time in the bathroom. I come off stage during the drum solo in Radioactive. Go out, finish Radioactive, and then immediately come. >> Are you surprised I have to pee? >> I'm surprised that you choose the exact moment. >> I have to pee a lot. [Applause]
